profile.name: Jarred Sumner
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Open Source Enthusiast | Database Sharding Expert
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for open-source development. Proficient in multiple programming languages, including TypeScript, Zig, and C++. Proven expertise in testing and debugging, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality solutions.
profile.company:

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of multiple open-source projects, including Bun and tree-sitter-typescript.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Developed and maintained a robust testing framework for Bun's test suite.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Worked on multiple projects, including node-tree-sitter and expo.
Demonstrated expertise in testing and debugging for various clients.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of Bun, a Rust-based package manager for JavaScript.
Participated in code reviews and ensured high-quality code standards.
